extendedInfo.description: MoveBlue is a free application which allows students and staff of the University of Michigan to see real-time campus bus tracking and route information.**NOTE: THIS IS FOR THE UNIVERSITY OF MICHIGAN MAGICBUS SYSTEM ONLY**Thank you all for your support over the past 2 years, MoveBlue has grown tremendously with your continued and valued feedback. Please visit us at our homepage!Features include:* Real-time bus mapping* Location-based filtering* Show next bus arrival time* Show buses arriving at your stop* Bus route filtering* NightRide Service extension* Much more!With this app you can easily plan your arrival to the nearest bus stop and determine when the next bus is on its way!Tags: Move Blue, Magic Bus, MagicBus, UMICH, University of Michigan

reviews.title: From DroidMonkey:
reviews.comment: Please note that our accuracy is bounded by the accuracy of the underlying data feed which we have no control over. Thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Jelly bean update oh no
reviews.comment: So after updating my phone to jelly bean the data no longer loads!  Also,  while it was great for the most part when it was still working,  the gps would often show the wrong location,  even though Google maps did
reviews.author: Christopher Nguyen

reviews.title: Doesn\'t load
reviews.comment: Recently, says loading routes but never finishes loading. My phone \'s connection works fine. Please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: This app is quick, easy, and just plain works! One gripe I have is that when you zoom the map it deselects whichever bus you had selected and you have to find it again to see the stops. Otherwise this does exactly what it should.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome stuff
reviews.comment: Really helpful due to realtime updates. Stops were a smart addition!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Times are way off for at least intercampus. This app will guarantee you\'re late.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The map tends to refresh at times when it does not need to (ie I don\'t scroll at all and it still refreshes). Otherwise- great and very reliable
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wow great app! Use it daily:)
